description: Example configuration showing what the plugin generates for the CLI
note: This file is for reference only - the plugin generates this automatically

tasks.name: Image Title
tasks.prompt: Please generate a title with at most 50 characters for this image, describing the main subject, scene, or content. The title should be a single sentence.

tasks.name: Image Description
tasks.prompt: Please describe this image in a single paragraph with at most 200 characters. The description may include the main objects, scene, colors, composition, atmosphere and other visual elements.

tasks.name: Keywords
tasks.prompt: Generate 5-10 keywords for this image, separated by commas, describing the theme, style, content, etc.
